abstract: Hypertrophic osteoarthropathy is a syndrome presenting with dclubbing, limbs enlargement, pain and swelling of foot and long bones osteitis. Hypertrophic osteoarthropathy is a rare paraneoplastic syndrome in the patients with primary or metastatic lung cancer. We report 39-year old female patient who presented with arthritis and paraneoplastic hypertrophic osteoarthropathy revealing lung adenocarcinoma.
title: [Paraneoplastic hypertrophic osteoarthropathy].
